title: User Signup with Valid Data
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign up with valid credentials and role selection.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Enter valid username, email, password, and select a valid user role.
Submit the signup form.
Check user account is created and user is redirected to the personalized dashboard.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure users can log in successfully using valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
User is authenticated and navigated to their personalized dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails when an incorrect password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Login is denied and an appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Password Recovery via Email
description: Validate the password recovery process works when a registered email is submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page.
Enter a registered email address.
Submit the password recovery request.
Check email with password reset instructions is sent to the user.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Confirm users with different roles (User, Admin, Super Admin) have permissions and UI elements appropriate to their role.

steps.description: Log in as a regular user.
Verify access is restricted to normal user features; admin dashboard is not accessible.
Log out and log in as an admin.
Verify the admin dashboard is accessible with user management and analytics features.
Log out and log in as super admin.
Verify super admin has access to all admin features plus additional super admin controls.

title: Create New Task with Category and Deadline
description: Verify that users can create a new task with assigned category, priority, status, and deadline.

steps.description: Navigate to the task management page.
Click the 'Create New Task' button.
Fill in task details including title, description, category, priority, and deadline.
Submit the new task.
Verify task appears in task list with correct details and deadline visualization.

title: Edit Existing Task and Update Status
description: Verify users can edit an existing task's details including changing its status and category.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing task's detail view.
Modify task fields such as title, category, priority, status, or deadline.
Save changes to the task.
Verify the task is updated and changes reflect in the task list and status tracking.

title: Delete a Task
description: Ensure users can delete a task and it no longer appears in their task list.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing task.
Click the delete task button and confirm the action.
Verify the task is removed from the list and cannot be accessed.

title: Drag and Drop Task Reordering
description: Verify that users can reorder tasks within categories via drag-and-drop functionality and the new order is persisted.

steps.description: Go to the task list view with multiple tasks in a category.
Drag a task and drop it into a new position within the same category.
Verify task order changes visually and persists after page reload.

title: View Academic Routines by Day and Week
description: Validate that users can view their daily and weekly academic routines correctly displayed and updated.

steps.description: Navigate to the routines page.
Verify current day's routines are displayed correctly.
Switch to weekly view.
Confirm routines for the entire week are shown properly and time slots match schedule.

title: Access and View Course Information and Study Materials
description: Ensure users can access course details and view available study materials and lecture slides without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to academic management section.
Select a course from the list.
Verify that course details including instructor info and schedule are displayed.
Access study materials repository for the selected course.
Verify all relevant study materials and lecture slides load and can be browsed.

title: Global Search with Filters for Tasks and Academic Content
description: Validate that the global search feature returns correct results and filters tasks by status, category, and date as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to the search page.
Enter search keyword relevant to tasks or academic content.
Verify search results include matching tasks and academic items.
Apply filters for task status, category, and date range.
Verify search results update to reflect filters accurately.

title: Push Notification Arrival and Content Accuracy
description: Ensure that push notifications are received timely for deadlines and system updates and that notification content matches the expected message.

steps.description: Trigger a notification event (e.g., task deadline approaching).
Verify that the push notification is received on the device promptly.
Check notification content matches the expected deadline alert message.

title: In-App Notification Navigation
description: Validate that tapping an in-app notification navigates the user to the relevant task or academic content detail page.

steps.description: Receive an in-app notification.
Click on the notification.
Verify navigation leads to the corresponding task or content detail page.

title: Admin Dashboard User Management Functions
description: Confirm that an admin can view, edit, and delete user accounts via the admin dashboard as per role permissions.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user.
Navigate to the user management section of the admin dashboard.
Select a user account and perform edit operations (update roles or status).
Verify user details updated successfully.
Delete a user account.
Verify the user account is removed and no longer listed.

title: Admin Dashboard Analytics Visualization Accuracy
description: Verify that system usage analytics data is loaded correctly and visualizations display accurate metrics on admin dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as admin.
Open the analytics section of the admin dashboard.
Verify charts and graphs render properly and reflect accurate system usage data.

title: Performance: Verify Lazy Loading and Caching
description: Check that lazy loading and caching mechanisms work correctly to optimize load time and responsiveness.

steps.description: Navigate through task lists and academic content pages.
Verify that content loads progressively (lazy loading) and cached data is used on repeat visits to reduce load time.

title: Responsive UI on Different Devices
description: Ensure the UI adapts fluidly across mobile phones, tablets, and desktops maintaining usability and accessibility standards.

steps.description: Access the application on devices with varying screen sizes.
Verify that layout, navigation elements, and content scale appropriately without overlap or truncation.

title: Offline Mode Basic Functionality
description: Validate that the application allows basic task viewing and management while offline using cached data.

steps.description: Load the application and ensure data is cached.
Disable network connection and reload the application.
Verify users can view cached tasks and routine information offline.

title: Security: Supabase Row Level Security Enforcement
description: Verify backend Supabase Row Level Security policies prevent unauthorized data access across user roles.

steps.description: Attempt to access data rows beyond authorized scope as a regular user.
Verify access is denied to unauthorized data.
Perform similar attempts as admin and super admin users.
Verify that access aligns with role-based permissions.

title: Environment Variable Protection Validation
description: Ensure environment variables containing sensitive configuration are not exposed in client bundles or logs.

steps.description: Build the application and inspect client bundle files.
Verify no sensitive environment variables or secret keys are present in distributed bundles or error logs.

title: User Profile Update and Persistence
description: Verify users can view and update their profile information and changes persist on reload.

steps.description: Navigate to the profile settings page.
Modify details such as display name, email preferences, or other allowed profile fields.
Save changes.
Verify that updates are reflected immediately and persist after logout and login.

title: Lecture Slide Viewing and Navigation
description: Validate that users can open, navigate through, and close lecture slides smoothly without UI glitches or errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the lecture slides page.
Open a lecture slide deck.
Navigate through slides forward and backward.
Verify slides render correctly and navigation controls respond without lag or errors.
Close the slide viewer.
Confirm return to previous page without state loss.

title: Resume After Long Idle (Session Expiry)
description: Verify that after extended inactivity (simulated by expiring Supabase session), resuming the app refreshes auth and task data loads without infinite skeleton/loading.

steps.description: Open the app and log in if prompted.
Simulate long idle by forcing the stored Supabase session expiry (e.g., localStorage key 'nesttask_supabase_auth' expires_at set to past).
Simulate resume/focus by triggering a focus event and a visibilitychange event.
Verify task list loads (network call to /rest/v1/tasks succeeds) OR user is gracefully returned to login; app must not remain stuck in loading state.
